data.question: What is the DOI for the International Edition of the paper?
What type of structure was synthesized using A1/A2-thiopyridyl pillar[5]arene L and silver(I) trifluoroacetate?
True or False: The C8 guest molecule only threads into the pillar[5]arene unit in the structure.
What is the role of the C8 guest molecule in the structure?
data.answer: The C8 guest molecule threads into the pillar[5]arene unit and also crosslinks the 1D coordinative polymeric arrays.

data.question: True or False: The formation of the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane is driven by an adaptive rearrangement that minimizes steric clashes.
What is the formula for the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane synthesized?
True or False: The 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane structure is the first example of its kind.
What is the significance of the length of the dinitrile guest in the synthesis?
data.answer: The length of the dinitrile guest influences the structures of the corresponding poly-pseudo-rotaxane products.

data.question: True or False: The pillar[5]arene unit in the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane is significantly tilted.
What is the outcome when C3–C7 guests are used instead of C8?
data.answer: No products were isolated when C3–C7 guests were used.

data.question: True or False: The 1D coordination polymer 1 can directly transform into the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane 3.
What is the yield of the crystalline product 3?
How does the configuration of the threading C8 guest differ from the crosslinking C8 guest?
data.answer: The threading C8 guest shows a G-T-T-T-T-T-T arrangement, while the crosslinking C8 guest has a T-T-T-T-T-T-T configuration.

data.question: True or False: The CF3COO@ ions remain uncoordinated in the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane structure.
What is the role of silver(I) trifluoroacetate in the synthesis?
data.answer: Silver(I) trifluoroacetate is used to form the coordination network in the poly-pseudo-rotaxane structures.

data.question: True or False: The 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane structure can be exfoliated into multi-layered sheets.
What changes occur in the position of C8 during the formation of the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane?
data.answer: A 'pulling up' of C8 of around 3 c and the bending of one terminus to give a hooklike shape.

data.question: What is the coordination environment of the AgI atom in the 1D coordination polymer 1?
data.answer: The AgI atom is five-coordinate, with AgI bound to two nitrogen donors from two different L ligands and one CF3COO@ ion in a bidentate manner.

data.question: True or False: The signals of the C8 guest in the NMR spectra for 3 show a remarkable broadening due to the highly restricted network structure.
What is the proposed pathway for the formation of the 2D poly-pseudo-rotaxane?
data.answer: The pathway involves initial threading of C8 into L to form a pseudo-rotaxane, followed by coordinative polymerization to form a 1D ladder-like poly-pseudo-rotaxane intermediate, and finally crosslinking by other C8 guests to form the 2D structure.
